segments.text: I need to purchase some business cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . How many are you thinking about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you'll just fill out this form , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want the new cards to be exactly like this card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can do that very easily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ... Okay , I'm done . Here's the form and my old card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . Your order will take only one week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , I think it would be better if I could pick it up in three days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can do that . It'll just cost you extra .
segments.speaker: S2
